text: Znayte, shcho sered vas perebuvaye Poslanetsʹ Allaha. Yakby vin slukhavsya vas u bahatʹokh spravakh, to vy potrapyly b u skrutu. Prote Allah dozvolyv vam polyubyty viru, zrobyv yiyi prekrasnoyu dlya vashykh serdetsʹ i daruvav nenavystʹ do nevirʺya, nechestya ta neposlukhu. Same taki ydutʹ pryamym shlyakhom —
